Q:Let us then move to the definition that was provided you during your
deposition. We will have that marked as Grand Jury Exhibit WJC-2....
[Definition of Sexual Relations] For the purposes of this deposition, a person
engages  in  “sexual  relations”  when  the  person  knowingly  engages  in  or
causes—(1) contact with the genitalia, anus, groin, breast, inner thigh, or but-
